001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005import javax.annotation.concurrent.Immutable;
006import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
007import java.util.Map;
008
009
010/**
011 * Specifies a {@link ModelCodec} which uses {@link CollapsedMessage} instances and native Java types to model business
012 * data. This codec uses the partner {@link ObjectModelSerializer} and {@link ObjectModelDeserializer} to go between
013 * these alternate/intermediate representations and {@link Message} instances.
014 */
015@Immutable
016@ThreadSafe
017public final class ObjectModelCodec<Model extends Message> implements ModelCodec<Model, Map<String, ?>> {
018  /** Model builder instance to use for spawning models. */
019  private final Message.Builder builder;
020
021  /**
022   * Private constructor. Creates a new object model codec from scratch.
023   *
024   * @param builder Builder for the message which is handled by this codec instance.
025   */
026  private ObjectModelCodec(@Nonnull Message.Builder builder) {
027    this.builder = builder;
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * Create or resolve an {@link ObjectModelCodec} instance for the provided model type. Object model codecs are
032   * immutable and share no state, so they may be shared between threads for a given type.
033   *
034   * @param <M> Model type for which we are acquiring an object codec.
035   * @param messageInstance Message instance (empty) to use for type information.
036   * @return Object model codec for the provided data model.
037   */
038  public static @Nonnull <M extends Message> ObjectModelCodec<M> forModel(M messageInstance) {
039    return forModel(messageInstance.newBuilderForType());
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Create or resolve an {@link ObjectModelCodec} instance for the provided model builder. Object model codecs are
044   * immutable and share no state, so they may be shared between threads for a given type.
045   *
046   * @param <M> Model type for which we are acquiring an object codec.
047   * @param messageBuilder Message builder (empty) to use for type information.
048   * @return Object model codec for the provided data model.
049   */
050  public static @Nonnull <M extends Message> ObjectModelCodec<M> forModel(Message.Builder messageBuilder) {
051    return new ObjectModelCodec<>(messageBuilder);
052  }
053
054  // -- Components -- //
055  /**
056   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelSerializer} attached to this adapter.
057   *
058   * @return Serializer instance.
059   */
060  @Override
061  public @Nonnull ModelSerializer<Model, Map<String, ?>> serializer() {
062    return null;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelDeserializer} attached to this adapter.
067   *
068   * @return Deserializer instance.
069   */
070  @Override
071  public @Nonnull ModelDeserializer<Map<String, ?>, Model> deserializer() {
072    return null;
073  }
074}
